mapper.sql: FROM SYSTEM_INQUIRY_BOARD INNER JOIN PERSON ON (USER_ID = ID)
SIB_NO ,USER_ID ,SIB_TTL ,SIB_CN ,SIB_DT ,CASE SIB_STTS_YN WHEN 'N' THEN '요청' WHEN 'Y' THEN '완료' ELSE '알 수 없음' END AS SIB_STTS_YN
mapper.select:
SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT
FROM SYSTEM_INQUIRY_BOARD ORDER BY SIB_NO DESC ) A

SELECT SI.SIB_NO, SI.USER_ID, P.NM AS NM, SI.SIB_TTL, SI.SIB_CN, SI.SIB_DT, CASE SI.SIB_STTS_YN WHEN 'N' THEN '요청' WHEN 'Y' THEN '완료' ELSE '알 수 없음' END AS SIB_STTS_YN, SI.SIB_ANS, SI.SIB_TIME FROM SYSTEM_INQUIRY_BOARD SI INNER JOIN PERSON P ON SI.USER_ID = P.ID WHERE SI.SIB_NO = #{sibNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SYSTEM_INQUIRY_BOARD WHERE SIB_NO = #{sibNo, jdbcType= VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE SYSTEM_INQUIRY_BOARD SET SIB_ANS = NULL, SIB_STTS_YN = 'N' WHERE SIB_NO = #{sibNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
